name: Compass Urgent Accommodation Vouchers
description: Compass Urgent Accommodation Vouchers provides brief hotel stays for families experiencing homelessness when emergency shelter is not an option.
fullDescription: Compass Urgent Accommodation Vouchers provides brief hotel stays for families experiencing homelessness when emergency shelter is not an option.
whatTheyOffer: Compass Urgent Accommodation Vouchers provides brief hotel stays for families experiencing homelessness when emergency shelter is not an option.
howToGetIt: Compass’ Central City Access Point can determine your eligibility for services available through San Francisco’s Family Coordinated Entry system. The best way to receive services is to visit the Compass Family Services Hub at 37 Grove Street during operating hours listed below to meet with a staff member for an eligibility assessment. ​ ​
keywords: we are a family with children under 18 years old.
